alert.note: Alert for Missaukee; Wexford (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 10:31AM EDT until August 03 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Wexford County in northern Michigan... Missaukee County in northern Michigan... * Until 1115 AM EDT. * At 1031 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Boon, or 8 miles west of Cadillac, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Meauwataka around 1035 AM EDT. Cadillac and Mitchell State Park around 1040 AM EDT. Mcbain, Lucas and Jennings around 1050 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lake City, Falmouth, Vogel Center and Moddersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
